definitions.definition: the science or practice of farming
definitions.labels: (especially North American English)(British English)(British English)(North American English)(informal)(British English, informal)North American English, informal

examples.text: The number of people employed in agriculture has fallen in the last decade.
50% of the country’s population depends on agriculture.

wordOrigin: late Middle English: from Latin agricultura, from ager, agr- ‘field’ + cultura ‘growing, cultivation’.
